none: Two totem poles, a photograph of the Whale House, a photograph of Chief Skwal of Kasaan with the caption, "the last of the Hydak, the late Chief Skwal of Kasaan, Prince of Wales Island, S. E. Alaska, born 1790, ago 90 yrs, weight 320 lbs".
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.

Front cover states that this song is: "respectfully dedicated to the Tilicums of Elttaes by I. H. Smith".  The front cover also contains historical information regarding the origin of the song and the Hydak.

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.

seo.title: March of the Tilikums - Pacific Northwest Sheet Music Collection
